sections.title: About
sections.content: Hi there! My name is David, a dad to triplets with plenty of talents and skillz. I'm using this time to educate myself on computer sciences so that I can make a career change. I'm really interested in computers and have been building up my skills by creating a homelab with security layers, hypervisors, Raspberry Pi's, Linux devices, and virtual machines.

sections.title: Skills
sections.content:
• HTML, CSS, JavaScript
  • Node.js, React
  • Linux command-line
  • C++ and Python
  • Internet protocols and bug testing
